data.title: About JMDG: Activate and Captivate your Audience
data.meta_description: Jax Media offers digital marketing solutions that attract customers to your brand to help you with marketing your value proposition to target customers.
data.text: JMDG, is a Minority Small Disadvantaged Business established in 2009, providing innovative solutions to our customers in the areas of user experience, design, ideation, marketing strategy, software development, digital, video production, and 508 accessibility compliance. What makes JMDG different is that our solutions are comprehensive by offering end to end solution with exceptional results. Our creative strategies are data driven. As experts in our industry we are connected by extraordinary talent coupled with creative partners with direct experience in user experience design, development, and digital content distribution. JMDG pro-actively ignite and unlocks the value of your brand.
